head.title: About me

body:
I am Rafael Calsaverini. This is my blog.

I like bayesian statistics, information theory, haskell programming and statistical physics.

I also like music, software engineering and lasagna.

This website is made with Phenomic.

If you are curious about it, you can take a look at existing websites that use Phenomic, some projects share their source code!
